name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
description: Unleash your skin's natural radiance with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, a powerful elixir meticulously crafted for oily and combination skin types. This potent serum boasts a 10% concentration of pure Vitamin C, a powerhouse ingredient renowned for its brightening capabilities. Expertly blended with hydrating Hyaluronic Acid, it works synergistically to visibly fade dark spots, even out skin tone, and impart a luminous, healthy glow. To experience its transformative effects, simply apply 2-3 drops to your face every morning before sunscreen. While individuals with sensitive skin may experience a mild tingling sensation, this is a normal indication of the active ingredients at work. Embrace the journey to a brighter, more radiant complexion with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum.
benefits: Promotes a brighter, more radiant complexion
